85592.summary: Some customers in the Glenrosa area of West Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85592.title: Dec 23 - West Kelowna (Glenrosa) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
